item.title: CI is hard!
item.description:
Buildbot, the venerable Python continuous integration server, has the reputation of being complex and difficult to set up.

item.title: What to write
item.description: Tech docs can take a bunch of different forms ranging from high-level overviews, to step-by-step walkthroughs, to auto-generated API documentation.
